Html:
Rawr can't get TW server's char file on armory, even with  Rawr addon.

Don't know why. I will receive an error when i /rawr export and do nothing.

We really need this awesome tool, so plz check out for Chinese version on Taiwan server.

Sorry for my poor English though :P

Ty for reading.

We're still working on updating the addon.

If you can give us a link to your character on armory we can look into what is wrong with the import.

For example. TW-阿薩斯(Arthus) Druid 超可憐的小孩

http://tw.battle.net/wow/zh/character/%E9%98%BF%E8%96%A9%E6%96%AF/%E8%B6%85%E5%8F%AF%E6%86%90%E7%9A%84%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A9/simple

 

Can't load from B.net, as the picture.

http://i.imgur.com/WlRfg.png

 

About Rawr addon :  If i type "/rawr export" in game, nothing will happen, and i'll hear a fatality sound from Bugsack.

 

(Error message)

System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null.
Parameter name: key
   at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.FindEntry(TKey key)
   at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.TryGetValue(TKey key, TValue& value)
   at Rawr.Character.get_CalculationOptions() in F:\Theorycrafting\Rawr\Rawr-5.0\Rawr.Base\Character.cs:line 882
   at Rawr.Character.SerializeCalculationOptions() in F:\Theorycrafting\Rawr\Rawr-5.0\Rawr.Base\Character.cs:line 867
   at Rawr.Character.Save(Stream stream, Boolean closeStream) in F:\Theorycrafting\Rawr\Rawr-5.0\Rawr.Base\Character.cs:line 3400
   at Rawr.Server.Controllers.CharacterController.ConvertCharacterToXml(Character character) in F:\Theorycrafting\Rawr\Rawr-5.0\Child Projects\Rawr.Server\Rawr.Server\Controllers\CharacterController.cs:line 498
   at Rawr.Server.Controllers.CharacterController.HandleBattleNetCharacterRequest(String characterRegionServer) in F:\Theorycrafting\Rawr\Rawr-5.0\Child Projects\Rawr.Server\Rawr.Server\Controllers\CharacterController.cs:line 97

 

My English is not so good, so I'm not sure whether this post may help or not...

Thank you for replying my message :D

oh and the only character i can successfully load from armory is my mage

TW-阿薩斯(Arthus) Mage 閃舞星霜

http://tw.battle.net/wow/zh/character/%E9%98%BF%E8%96%A9%E6%96%AF/%E9%96%83%E8%88%9E%E6%98%9F%E9%9C%9C/simple

 

Others like my friends or my druid can't load from armory, don't know why.

(Rawr Addon still can't export though, even my mage.)
